text_blocks.content: FOR DATE M. OF PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION WANTS TO SEE YOU RETURNED YOUR CALL MESSAGE

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scan of a page containing three 'Important Message' records. The records are filled with handwritten notes and contain phone messages from various individuals. The document quality is somewhat degraded, likely due to the scanning process.
